channel.title: Drafts on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on Küse's Codes

item.description: Install phpmyadmin with brew ==> Pouring phpmyadmin--5.2.1.sonoma.bottle.tar.gz ==> Caveats To enable phpMyAdmin in Apache, add the following to httpd.conf and restart Apache: Alias /phpmyadmin /usr/local/share/phpmyadmin <Directory /usr/local/share/phpmyadmin/> Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews AllowOverride All <IfModule mod_authz_core.

EDI middleware Comparisons https://www.g2.com/categories/electronic-data-interchange-edi https://michaelachrisco.github.io/Electronic-Interchange-Github-Resources/ https://datainterchange.com/edifacts-standards-explained/ Antlr An Antlr implementation: https://github.com/aaronhuggins/js-edi/tree/main/grammars/fact // Special token for discovering the position of control characters for a given EDI document.
